title: _WDF_REQUEST_SEND_OPTIONS_FLAGS (wudfddi_types.h)
description: The WDF_REQUEST_SEND_OPTIONS_FLAGS enumeration type defines flags that a driver can specify when it calls IWDFIoRequest::Send.
